General.Name: CECEP Wind-Power Corp Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: CECEP Wind-power Corporation Co.,Ltd. develops, invests in, manages, constructs, operates, and maintains wind power generation projects primarily in China. As of December 31, 2021, it had an installed capacity of 4.2942 million kilowatts. CECEP Wind-power Corporation Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Beijing, China. CECEP Wind-power Corporation Co.,Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of China Energy Conservation and Environmental Protection Group.
